resources.name: Login
resources.description:
Required Body JSON

```
{
	'username'      => 'required',
	'password'      => 'required',
	'device'        => 'nullable|in:web,android,ios,huawei',
	'device_token'  => 'nullable', // dari firebase device token,
	'device_detail' => 'nullable', // contoh: 'iPhone 15 Pro Max / Chrome'
}
```

resources.name: Sertifikasi Baru
resources.description:
Required Multipart/FormData 

```
		'nama_usaha'            => 'required',
		'status_usaha'          => 'required',
		'loc_lat'               => 'required',
		'loc_lng'               => 'required',
		'loc_addr'              => 'required',
		'is_daging'             => 'required|in:0,1',
		'rph_name'              => 'nullable',
		'product_name'          => 'required',
		'product_video'         => 'required',
		'product_desc'          => 'nullable',
		'product_desc_audio'    => 'nullable',
		'product_desc_img'      => 'nullable',
		'product_desc_pdf'      => 'nullable',
		'bank_id'               => 'nullable',
		'token'                 => 'nullable',
```

* RPH Name akan berifat wajib jika is_daging = 1

* Semua file disini harus di upload di api /upload

Product Desc
```
product_desc, product_desc_audio, product_desc_img, product_desc_pdf secara default nullable dan wajib diisi salah satu
```

Contoh isi product_desc_audio: 
```
upload/files/2025/04/v3JnDy8WkQPuE3Umqh45_12_5cca2629dfaa33f23c9be1756c8088ab_file.ogg
```
Contoh isi product_desc_img: 
```
upload/photos/2025/04/v3JnDy8WkQPuE3Umqh45_12_5cca2629dfaa33f23c9be1756c8088ab_file.jpg
```
Contoh isi product_desc_video: 
```
upload/videos/2025/04/v3JnDy8WkQPuE3Umqh45_12_5cca2629dfaa33f23c9be1756c8088ab_file.mp4
```

Contoh isi product_desc_pdf: 
```
upload/files/2025/04/v3JnDy8WkQPuE3Umqh45_12_5cca2629dfaa33f23c9be1756c8088ab_file.pdf
```

Bank / Token
```
Wajib memilih salah satu object bank_id atau token
```
Data Bank Dapat di lihat di folder Master Data / Bank

*Jika Menggunakan Token Wajib Verifikasi Token setelah user mengisi token tersebut


Example Response With bank_id
```
{

resources.name: Listener Tugas
Ambil Tugas
Detail
resources.description:
URL
```
{{ _.api }}/sertifikasi-auditor/{sertifikasi_id}
```

Rule status_auditor

- Jika "waiting" maka bisa ke api Ambil Tugas
- Jika "upload" maka bisa menggunakan api Verify KTP & Verify Product 
- Jika "analyze" maka bisa menggunakan api Analisis

resources.name: Verify KTP
resources.description:
URL
```
{{ _.api }}/sertifikasi-auditor/{sertifikasi_id}/verify-ktp
```

Required Body Multipart/FormData
```
ktp_file: FILE|IMAGE
```

Example Response Success

```
{
	"status": true,
	"data": {
		"status": true
	},
	"message": [
		"Data KTP Sesuai"
	]
}
```

resources.name: Verify Product
resources.description:
Required Body Json
```
{
	'video_url'     => 'required',
	'lat'           => 'required',
	'lng'           => 'required',
	'audio_url'     => 'nullable',
	'accept'        => 'required|in:Y/N',
	'note'          => 'required|minimal text length:10'
}
```

URL
```
{{ _.api }}/sertifikasi-auditor/{sertifikasi_id}/verify
```

Example Response Success

```
{
	"status": true,
	"data": {
		"pendamping_id": 1231,
		"sertifikasi_id": "123"
	},
	"message": "Hasil audit berhasil diterima"
}
```

resources.name: Listener Tugas
Ambil Tugas
Detil
resources.description:
URL
```
{{ _.api }}/sertifikasi-fatwa/{sertifikasi_id}
```

Rule object status_fatwa

- Jika "waiting" maka bisa ke api Ambil Tugas
- Jika "assign" maka bisa menggunakan api Pemberian Fatwa
- Jika "done" maka proses sertifikasi selesai

resources.name: Pemberian Fatwa
resources.description:
URL
```
{{ _.api }}/sertifikasi-fatwa/165/verify
```

Required Body Json
```
{
	'approve'           => 'required|in:Y / N',
	'summary'           => 'nullable', long text max 4000
}
```

resources.name: Upload File
resources.description:
Required Multipart/FormData

```
{
	"file": "required|FILE|mimes type: jpg,png,jpeg,gif,mp4,m4v,webm,flv,mov,mpeg,mp3,wav,mkv,ogg,pdf,doc,docx",
	"convert": "nullable|in: 0 / 1"
}
```

Jika convert == 1 dan 
- Jika file image maka sistem akan mengekstrak text yang ada pada gambar
- Jika file audio maka sistem akan mengconvert audio menjadi teks
- Jika file pdf/word maka sistem akan mengekstrak text yang ada pada gambar
- Jika file video maka tidak ada pengaruh apapun, untuk ekstrak video proses produksi gunakan api Upload Video Produksi

Example Response Success
```
{
	"status": true,
	"data": {
		"file_id": 15,
		"path": "upload\/photos\/2025\/04\/cbAG8HsLj2BVswZ9l6Uz_30_7cb28b62784da401686858a177e0cf28_image.png",
		"results": null
	},
	"message": [
		"Success"
	]
}
```

resources.name: Upload Video Produksi
resources.description:
Required Multipart/FormData
```
file: "required| FILE |mimes type: mp4,avi,mov,mkv|max duration: 300 second"
```

Example Response Success
```
{
	"status": true,
	"data": {
		"file_id": 17,
		"filename": "upload\/videos\/2025\/04\/uUdptrefdICOiBbWePNk_30_4bec33fd057fc274b0dad307ea736ad6ssstik.io_@2beha10ribu_1746019219677.mp4",
		"results": {
			"bahan": [
				"Mie instan 1 bungkus",
				"Bumbu mie instan",
				"Bawang merah 1 siung",
				"Bawang putih 1 siung",
				"Air secukupnya",
				"Telur 1 butir",
				"Minyak goreng secukupnya"
			],
			"cara": [
				"Iris bawang merah dan bawang putih.",
				"Panaskan minyak, tumis bawang hingga harum.",
				"Tambahkan air ke dalam wajan.",
				"Masukkan bumbu mie instan.",
				"Masukkan mie instan ke dalam wajan.",
				"Pecahkan telur, aduk rata.",
				"Masak hingga matang.",
				"Sajikan di piring."
			]
		}
	},
	"message": [
		"Success"
	]
}
```

resources.name: Delete File
Payment Test
resources.description:
Required Body Json
```
{
	"code": "required" from obj order_id, // example: GH-00000026
	"method": "required | success / cancel"
}
```
